# bpkio Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "bpkio" {
  api_key = "changeme"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `api_key` (String, Sensitive) API key for Broadpeak

### Optional

- `endpoint` (String) The Broadpeak API endpoint. Defaults to `https://api.broadpeak.io`.
